data.message: You all think being a "Stan" is a good thing? Remember what happened to the original Stan and tell me again how proud are you to be one.

replies.message:
Zdravkane,first grow up. 2nd, you already know that "Stan" song is  nothing more that a song? 
Men,too much Dump ass kids as you nowdays
First learn how to fucking write properly, and then we may talk like grown men. Dumbass.

Actually Stan was based on facts. A lot of the song was real...any true Eminem fan would know that by now. And  calling each other dumbasses is extremely childish. You both need to grow up and catch up on your facts!
